unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Increase the Width of Confidence Interval
question_text: Here is the formula used for constructing a confidence interval for the slope of a regression model: $$b\pm t^{*} (SE_{b})$$ Suppose you are told that you need to increase the width of a confidence interval.  All of the following answers will accomplish this except :

choices.text: Increase the value of t ∗ t ∗ .
Increase the value of the standard error.
Increase the value of the sample size.
Increase the value of the margin of error.
